Package org.linuxforhealth.fhir.database.utils.common

Class DateMath

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.linuxforhealth.fhir.database.utils.common.DateMath
  • public class DateMath
extends java.lang.Object
    Simple utility class to handle the date arithmetic we need for rolling date-based partitions TODO use java.time instead
